# isLastFrame

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates the last frame in a tracking sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLastFrame: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the current tracker will be released to the pool of available trackers when the current frame finishes processing.

## Configuring a Tracking Request

- **VNRequestTrackingLevel**: An enumeration of tracking priorities.
- **inputObservation**: The observation object defining a region to track.
- **trackingLevel**: A value for specifying whether to prioritize speed or location accuracy.
